attributes.action: introduce legislation to change the law so that any local councils who lose council taxpayers money because they invested unwisely must refund such moneys, in the first instance, out of the pension funding taken out of council taxpayers payments and put to one side on behalf of councillors and council employees.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is immoral that council taxpayers should have to pay twice when people they entrust with looking after their council taxpayer pounds get it wrong.  There MUST be some accountability and responsibility among our councillors and the people they pay to give them advice, when it goes wrong.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
